thread.title: A Brief History of the Winter Olympics: Pushing the Extreme

title: A Brief History of the Winter Olympics: Pushing the Extreme
text: February 07, 2018 A Brief History of the Winter Olympics: Pushing the Extreme The 2018 Winter Olympics look different than they did when they began in 1924. This video explains the evolution of the games toward more X-Games-style events. By Adam Falk and Liliana Llamas Feb. 07, 2018 12:00 pm The 2018 Winter Olympics are bigger and more extreme than ever before, as death-defying sports make their way into the lineup. So how did we get here? Photo: Getty Images Pyeongchang 2018 Video coverage of the 2018 Winter Games in Pyeongchang, South Korea.
